mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.name AS "name", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.type AS "type", a.discount AS "discount", a.vm_ids AS "vendingMachine.id", a.campaign_no AS "campaignNo", a.state AS "state", a.operator AS "user.id"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_campaign( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, name, start_time, end_time, type, discount, vm_ids, campaign_no, state, operator ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{name}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{type}, #{discount}, #{vendingMachine.id}, #{campaignNo}, #{state}, #{user.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_campaign SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, name = #{name}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, type = #{type}, discount = #{discount}, vm_ids = #{vendingMachine.id}, campaign_no = #{campaignNo}, state = #{state}, operator = #{user.id} WHERE id = #{id}
